Hi there! I'm Morgan Evans—an HCI researcher and aspiring game designer in the School of Computer Science at CMU. I'm advised by Dr. Jessica Hammer and Dr. Geoff Kaufman.
I'm passionate about leading with empathy and self-awareness. Currently I'm designing a game to promote health literacy in diverse communities. I used to study privacy policies.

Publications
